text: I knew I wanted something different than
kind of this this normal path being a
young kid in my bedroom tinkering I use
fishing line electrical tubing Lego and
stumbled upon something that this hasn't
actually been created yet when I first
got this 3d printer it was almost hard
to fathom what I actually had I could
literally make anything I wanted that
allowed me to actually design something
that is not even existent in the world
yet I qualified for the state science
fair with the robotic arm project I'd
noticed that there's a small girl
actually playing with the hand you know
really focused on it I later realized
that this girl had a prosthetic limb it
was so expensive that it was almost a
burden for the family it was kind of a
moment that clicked that's sad
what I'm making and my bedroom could
potentially impact someone's life I went
back the drawing board I looked at what
was wrong with the Chrome prosthetics
the puzzle was how do you actually merge
man and machine how do you have someone
control this robotic arm as if it was
their own
for me everything really stumped from
the brain what if there to capture what
the brain is thinking and move the hand
with that
me being rid of all 16 now I I really
had no idea on how to even read the
brain so I actually went to Walmart and
bought this little game called mindflex
I pretty much took that apart their own
software to actually visualize all the
different waves that we got from the
headset
every thought we have gives off a
brainwave I was trying to find a way
that I could control really easily and
tell the hand to do some kind of action
in response to that thought
I started to turn these brain waves into
actual movements
I'm very grateful that that's what he
chose that he wanted to make a
difference for somebody's life we were
able to produce this full robotic
platform for it about five hundred
dollars we want everybody that is
missing a limb to be able to use what
we've created they released all the
files online meaning that anybody can
download this for robotic arm and
actually print it using any kind of 3d
printer
and look at myself when I was 14 team
came in my bedroom and now it has more
of a purpose behind it but really this
is something that I do enjoy I wouldn't
choose anything else except this this is
just what I'm supposed to do
